AgentCount.description: The number of load generators. If the number of concurrent virtual users exceeds 250 or the RPS exceeds 2,000, you can use multiple load generators. AllConcurrencyBegin.description:
The starting total number of concurrent virtual users in all sessions.

The value is evenly distributed among all sessions if you set TestMode to concurrency_mode. If you do not specify this parameter, you must configure **relationLoadConfig**.

AllConcurrencyLimit.title: 所有链路的最大并发总值，均分给每个链路，在并发模式下使用，若不设置该值，则relationLoadConfig必须填写
AllConcurrencyLimit.description:
The maximum total number of concurrent virtual users in all sessions.

The value is evenly distributed among all sessions if you set TestMode to concurrency_mode. If you do not specify this parameter, you must configure **relationLoadConfig**.

AllRpsBegin.title: 所有API的起始RPS总值，均分给每个API，在RPS模式下使用，若不设置该值，则apiLoadConfig必须填写
AllRpsBegin.description:
The starting RPS for all APIs.

The value is evenly distributed among all APIs if you set TestMode to RPS. If you do not specify this parameter, you must specify **apiLoadConfig**.

AllRpsLimit.title: 所有API的最大RPS总值，均分给每个API，在RPS模式下使用，若不设置该值，则apiLoadConfig必须填写
AllRpsLimit.description:
The maximum RPS for all APIs.

The value is evenly distributed among all APIs if you set TestMode to RPS. If you do not specify this parameter, you must specify **apiLoadConfig**.

Increment.title: 递增百分比，取值范围[10,100]，且是整十倍；只有在并发模式且是自动递增模式下有效，即 testMode=concurrency_mode 且 autoStep=true 时
Increment.description:
The increment percentage. Valid values: 10 to 100, in increments of 10.

This parameter takes effect only if you set `testMode=concurrency_mode`and `autoStep=true`.

KeepTime.title: 单量级持续时长，单位分钟，一定是小于施压时长 maxRunningTime
KeepTime.description: The duration of a specific load level. Unit: minutes. The value must be less than the value of **maxRunningTime**.

MaxRunningTime.title: 施压时长，单位分钟，[1-1440]
MaxRunningTime.description: The duration of load application. Unit: minutes. Valid values: 1 to 1440.

Pool.description: The origin of the load. "" indicates the Internet and intranet-vpc indicates the VPC.

RegionId.description: The region ID. This parameter is returned if the load is from a VPC.

SecurityGroupId.description: The ID of the security group. This parameter is returned if the load is from a VPC.

StartConcurrency.description: The start number of concurrent virtual users.

StartRps.description: The start requests per second (RPS). This parameter is returned if you set Mode to tps_mode.

Steps.title: 递增阶梯数。预热时间和预热阶段数都不配置时 使用固定压力值 只配置预热时间，不配置阶段数时 使用均匀递增 预热时间和阶段数都配置时，并且steps<rampUp 使用阶梯递增 不能只配置steps，不配置rampUp 如果这样配置，默认使用固定压力值
Steps.description: The number of incremented users per step. If RampUp or Steps is not specified, the fixed load is used. If RampUp is specified but Steps is not specified, the load increases uniformly based on the value of RampUp. If RampUp and Steps are specified and Steps is less than RampUp, the load increases based on the value of Steps. You cannot specify Steps without specifying RampUp. If you do so, the fixed load is used.

SyncTimerType.title: synchronizing timer 类型
SyncTimerType.description: The type of the synchronization timer.

VSwitchId.title: 交换机id，VPC压测时配置
VSwitchId.description: The ID of the vSwitch. This parameter is returned if the load is from a VPC.

VpcId.title: vpc的id，VPC压测时配置
VpcId.description: The ID of the VPC. This parameter is returned if the load is from a VPC.

Success.description:

*   false
